MessageSubject: Welcome to SIIWII Portal, please verify your email address
MessageBody:
Hello,

Are you ready to gain access to all of the assets we prepared for clients of SIIWII Portal?

You're almost ready to start enjoying SIIWII Portal, before being able to use your account you need to verify that this is your email address by clicking here:Verify

This link will verify your email address, and then you'll officially be a part of the SIIWII Portal community.

Domain name:{param2}

Account name:{param3}

User name:{param4}

Password:{param5}



See you there!

Kind Regards, SIIWII Team
